In this article, we discuss the following functions -

* `stvcLMexact()`
* `stvcLMstack()`
* `stvcGLMexact()`
* `stvcGLMstack()`

These functions can be used to fit Gaussian and non-Gaussian spatial-temporal point-referenced data.
